column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Old fashion / industrial furniture and ambiance
column2: super clean. Came there for a burger on a saturday at 2pm
column4: got seated right away. Specialized on whiskey more than 300... we got the chicken flatbread really good with caramelized onion and tomatoe
column5: the burger was one of the best we ever had
column6: meat was cooked really well and the bread was fantastic ;) the french fries are huge.
